Write it in.

If you want the editorial to draw attention to a subject, you want to tell me something, send a press release if you have any questions, send us a message right off the website. Messages from the COMMITMENT site are read in writing.If you want us to call you back or write, tell me how you can get in touch.♪ Keep in mind that the messages that come from this page are not published.

Dinamo Sinara will receive Astrachanca ' s house on 25 January

Sport25.01.2024 09:02
Comments0
25.01.2024 09:02

The Volgograd Hindbolic Dinamo Sinara today, 25 January, at the FOC for the name of the well-deserved Coach of the USSR and the RSFSR, Levon Akopian, on the Seven Winds in the first match of 1/4, the Final of the Russian Federation will meet with the Astrachanca. Starts at 18:30, reports V102.RU. Let us recall that the white and blue at the last stage in the fascinating exit game was played by Steavropole on penalty. Po...
